resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
While testing Remote URL I noticed that sound is not coming back after an interrupting by pressing "Stop" and  "Play" button one more time.

Not a regression, the behavior exists on 2.0.1 as well. 
This issue occurs only on Android devices with 2.2 version

Steps to reproduce:
1. Run KitchenSink
2. Go to Phone - Sound - Remote URL
3. Press "Play" button
4. Press "Stop" button
5. Press "Play" button again

Expected Result:
Should hear sound 

Actual Result:
Sound is not playing
fields.summary: Android: Sound - RemoteURL failed to reproduce  sound after Stop and Play again
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.0.3.201205231513
Titanium SDK: 2.0.2.v20120524124938
Devices: Droid1 (2.2.3)
         Nexus One (2.2.2)

jithinpv

Cannot reproduce.

Nexus4 Android version: 4.2

Closing, please reopen if the issue occurs again
